author: Play On Tabletop
description:
Want to play some KOTC yourself?  We are running two events coming up this year.

Game Con Canada,  Edmonton Canada- June 13th and 14th Kotc Tournament https://gameconcanada.com

Meepleathon - Kansas City Missouri - November 14th to 16th  https://tabletop.events/conventions/meeple-a-thon-2025/badgetypes

We partnered frontline gaming to create this King of the Colosseum battle set. If you have ever wanted to try the format at home you can with this set.  https://store.frontlinegaming.org/products/king-of-the-colosseum-set are from Frontline Gaming! 


Nick, and JT are joined by guests Alex and Jordan to play a three round mini-tournament. 
500 points, must have two units with the infantry key word. No epic heroes, no 

ARMY LISTS:

Nick - T'au Empire Retaliation Cadre

Coldstarr Battlesuits - Enhancement - Grenade Racks
StarScythe Battlesuits
Sunforge battlesuits
Stealthsuits
Stealthsuits

Alex  - Tyranids - Vanguard Onslaught
Broodlord
Gargoyles
Genestealers (5)
Lictor
Lictor
Lictor
title: Three round Live Mini 40k Tournament - 4 players, 500 points - King of the Colosseum.
